footer.description: Preserving your Mediterranean memories through high-end professional photography. Based in Oia, serving the entire island of Santorini.

ai.greeting: Hi there! I'm your ClickTale assistant. Looking for the perfect photo spot or need help planning your session route?
ai.title: ClickTale AI Guide
ai.errorFallback: Sorry, I couldn't generate an itinerary right now. Please try again later.
ai.errorConnection: Error generating plan. Please ensure you have a valid API connection.

couples.title: Couples
couples.description: Romantic sessions amidst blue domes and caldera sunsets.

family.title: Family
family.description: Fun, candid memories for the whole group to cherish.

lifestyle.title: Lifestyle
lifestyle.description: Solo travel and influencer content creation.

restaurants.title: Restaurants
restaurants.description: Culinary and architectural photography for businesses.

portfolio.title: Capturing Love & Life
portfolio.description: Browse my portfolio of moments captured across the island. From intimate sunsets in Oia to vibrant family memories.

wedding.title: Wedding Bliss
wedding.description: A special day at the edge.

hero.subtitle: High-end professional photography for those who want to turn their Greek island memories into gallery-grade art.

intro.name: Lina
intro.description: Santorini isn't just a destination for me; it's a living canvas. For 10 years, I've mastered the specific interplay of white architecture and volcanic shadows. My mission is simple: to make your legacy look beautiful.

services.title: Curated Experiences
services.subtitle: Precision, passion, and perfection in every genre of imagery.

faq.title: Details Matter
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about your high-end experience.

turnaround.question: What is your turnaround time?
turnaround.answer: For most sessions, you will receive your edited high-resolution gallery within 7-10 days. We also offer a "sneak peek" service where you get 5 photos within 24 hours.

bestTime.question: What is the best time for photos?
bestTime.answer: Sunrise and Sunset are the most magical. Sunrise offers cooler temperatures and fewer crowds, while Sunset provides the famous golden glow over the caldera.

wardrobe.question: Do you provide wardrobe advice?
wardrobe.answer: Absolutely! Once you book, we send over a style guide that includes color palette recommendations and fabric choices that look best against the white architecture.

booking.question: How do I book a session?
booking.answer: You can book directly through our website by clicking the "Book Now" button. We require a 25% deposit to secure your date.

about.heroLead: I am a visual storyteller based in the heart of Santorini. My passion is capturing the raw, unscripted moments of love against the backdrop of our endless blue skies.
about.heroBody: For over 5 years, I've had the privilege of documenting love stories from all over the world. Whether it's a secret proposal at sunset or an intimate elopement, my goal is to make you feel completely at ease.

light.title: Natural Light
light.description: I utilize the famous golden Greek sun to create warm, ethereal images that glow with authenticity.

candid.title: Candid Moments
candid.description: The best photos happen in between poses. I capture fleeting glances and genuine laughter.

stressFree.title: Stress-Free
stressFree.description: I guide you gently through the session, ensuring you feel relaxed, confident, and beautiful.

sarah.name: Sarah & James
sarah.review: Lina made us feel so comfortable from the very first moment. The photos are absolutely stunning and capture the magic of our honeymoon perfectly.

elena.name: Elena & Marco
elena.review: The best decision we made was choosing Lina for our engagement shoot. Her creativity and attention to detail is unmatched. We love every single photo!

jessica.name: Jessica Chen
jessica.review: Incredible photographer! She captured my solo adventure in Santorini perfectly. The images tell the story of my journey beautifully.

michael.name: Michael & Lisa
michael.review: From the initial consultation to the final photos, everything was seamless. Lina is professional, creative, and genuinely cares about her clients.

sophia.name: Sophia Rodriguez
sophia.review: This session exceeded all my expectations. The photos are not just beautiful—they capture the essence of who I am. Highly recommended!

david.name: David & Rachel
david.review: Worth every penny! Lina went above and beyond to make our vow renewal special. The golden hour shots are absolutely breathtaking.

contact.title: Let's Capture Your Story
contact.lead: Based in Oia, capturing love stories worldwide. Whether it's an engagement, wedding, or solo adventure, reach out to plan your dream session.
